concept.title: Contact and Legal Information
concept.shortdesc: Information to help you contact Adobe and to understand the legal issues concerning your use of this product and documentation.

section.title: Account Support
section.p: The Adobe support team is here to:

li.p: Ensure that you can use the product to its maximum capacity
Help resolve any technical difficulties you might have

section.title: Service and Billing Information
section.p: Depending on your service level, some options described in this manual might not be available to you. Because each account is unique, refer to your contract for pricing, due dates, terms, and conditions. If you would like to add to or otherwise change your service level, or if you have questions regarding your current service, please contact your Account Support Manager.

section.title: Feedback
section.p: We welcome any suggestions or feedback. Please send comments about the product to your Account Support Manager. For comments about this manual, use the Feedback button on each help topic.

section.title: Legal Information
section.p: A trademark symbol (®, ™, etc.) denotes an Adobe trademark.
All third-party trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Updated Information/Additional Third Party Code Information available at .
